sentence.Network_en: Sir Thomas More is remembered today as the author of Utopia.
sentence.Network_cn: 当今,托马斯·莫尔先生还被铭记为《乌托邦》的作者.

sentence.Network_en: She was entering the masses with the phantom of a future Utopia.
sentence.Network_cn: 她正用未来的乌托邦幻想来吸引群众.

sentence.Network_en: His Utopia is not a chimerical commonwealth but a practical improvement on what already exists.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的乌托邦不是空想的联邦,而是对那些已经存在的联邦事实上的改进.

entry.tran: 乌托邦；理想国；理想的完美社会
entry.def: If you refer to an imaginary situation as a utopia, you mean that it is one in which society is perfect and everyone is happy, but which you feel is not possible.

example.ex: We weren't out to design a contemporary utopia.
example.tran: 我们并不是要设计一个现代乌托邦。

means.word_mean: 1. ideally perfect state; especially in its social and political and moral aspects
2. a work of fiction describing a utopia

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"病"; 2. 表名词,"总称,状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: hypo在……下面+chondr忧郁+ia病→在下面忧郁→忧郁症
ambros不死的+ia总称,状态等→n.神仙食品,美味
corn角+u+cop丰富+ia表示物→表示丰富的角→丰饶角
in内部+sign信号+ia总称,状态等→内部标志

stems_affixes.value_cn: 知识分子[集合称],知识阶层,知识界
stems_affixes.word_buile: intelligent聪明的,伶俐的+s+ia总称,状态等→n.知识分子[集合称],知识阶层,知识界
milit兵+ia总称,状态等→n.民兵[组织]
minute细小的+ia总称,状态等→n.微枝末节,细节

stems_affixes.value_cn: 乌托邦,理想的完美境界,空想的社会改良计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: utop没有的地方即no place+ia总称,状态等→乌托邦现实中是没有的
